dct_title_s: Europa poly glotta : linguarum genealogiam exhibens, una cum literis, scribendiq[ue] modis, omnium gentium
dct_description_sm: Linguistic maps of Europe, Asia, Africa, and North and South America; relief shown pictorially. Includes charts showing alphabets used on each continent. From: Synopsis vniversae philologiae ... / a Godofredo Henselio. Norimbergae : Homann, 1741.
